description: Test file for a chess engine implementing game state generation, move making, and move generation logic. It contains tests for en passant, pawn promotion, check detection, and castling moves, referencing functions from 'chessEngine'.

methods.name: findMove(moves, from, to, extra = {})
methods.description: Utility function to find a specific move from a list of moves based on source and destination coordinates, and optional criteria like promotion and castling flags.
